channel.title: Items on Interface
channel.description:
Alright, so I'm trying to make an NPC open up the tanning interface (swap hides for tanned hides for crafting)
I want to know how to add items into the interface.
I think it has something to do with sendFrame126 and sendFrame246, but I'm not sure.
